//import React from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import "./Header.css" import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class Header extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state = { active: "Home" } } navigate = useNavigate() handleClick(act) { this.setState({ active: act }) if(act === 'Home') { this.navigate(('/')) } this.navigate(('/'+act)) } render() { return (
this.handleClick("Home")}>Home
this.handleClick("Timetable")}>Timetable
this.handleClick("Courses")}>Courses
this.handleClick("CourseRoad")}>CourseRoad
this.handleClick("Profile")}>Profile
) } } /*
Home
Timetable
Courses
CourseRoad
Profile
*/
